languages.text: "Если эти манеры тебе ближе, можешь продолжать вести себя так".

traits.locale_text: "Я хочу, чтобы ты и дальше оставалась собой настоящей".

languages.text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."
languages.original_text: "Если эти манеры тебе ближе, можешь продолжать вести себя так".

traits.locale_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."
"I want you to keep being the true you."
"If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."
"I want you to keep being the real you."
"If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."
"If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."
"If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

languages.text: “如果这样的你更真实，那你可以一直保持这个样子。”
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: “我希望你能一直做真实的你。”

languages.text: «Si esta forma de ser es más parecida a su yo verdadero, puede seguir actuando así».
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero que siga siendo tal y como es realmente».

languages.text: 「それが本当の自分に近いなら、そのままの態度でいたらいい」
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: 「ありのままのお前でいてくれ」

languages.text: "Wenn das Eurem wahren Ich mehr entspricht, verhaltet Euch ruhig weiter so."
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte, dass Ihr weiterhin Euer wahres Ich seid."

languages.text: « Si ce comportement est plus proche de votre véritable personnalité, continuez de vous conduire ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux que vous restiez telle que vous êtes réellement, même après ça. »

languages.text: "Bu hâlin gerçek sana daha uygunsa bu şekilde davranmaya devam edebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "If this is closer to the real you, then you can keep acting like this."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bu gerçekteki sana daha yakın ise, bu şekilde davranmaya devam edebilirsin."
